info.title: Scissors-API
info.summary: Scissors API provides a suite of endpoints for managing short links, Including creating shortened URLs, retrieving link history, customizing URLs, and Generating QR codes
info.description:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Scissors URL Shortener API
  description: API for shortening URLs, generating QR codes, and fetching link history.
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000
    description: Local development server

paths:
  /shorten:
    post:
      summary: Create a short URL
      description: Generates a short URL from the original URL provided by the user. Optionally allows for a custom URL.
      tags:
        - URL Shortening
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                originalUrl:
                  type: string
                  description: The original URL to be shortened.
                  example: https://example.com
                customUrl:
                  type: string
                  description: Optional custom alias for the shortened URL.
                  example: mycustomalias
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully created short URL
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  shortUrl:
                    type: string
                    description: The generated short URL.
                    example: http://localhost:5000/mycustomalias
        '400':
          description: Bad request, typically due to invalid URL or custom alias
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: Invalid URL

  /history:
    get:
      summary: Retrieve link history
      description: Fetches the history of all shortened URLs along with their corresponding QR codes.
      tags:
        - Link History
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully fetched link history
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    originalUrl:
                      type: string
                      description: The original URL.
                      example: https://example.com
                    shortUrl:
                      type: string
                      description: The shortened URL.
                      example: http://localhost:5000/mycustomalias
                    qrCode:
                      type: string
                      description: The QR code data for the shortened URL.
                      example: data:image/png;base64,...
        '500':
          description: Server error while fetching link history
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: Server error

  /{shortUrl}:
    get:
      summary: Redirect to original URL
      description: Redirects the user to the original URL based on the shortened URL.
      tags:
        - Redirection
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: shortUrl
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: The shortened URL identifier
      responses:
        '302':
          description: Redirect to the original URL
        '404':
          description: URL not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: URL not found

  /qr/{shortUrl}:
    get:
      summary: Generate QR code for a short URL
      description: Generates a QR code for the given short URL.
      tags:
        - QR Code
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: shortUrl
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: The shortened URL identifier
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successfully generated QR code
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  qrCode:
                    type: string
                    description: The QR code data for the shortened URL.
                    example: data:image/png;base64,...
        '404':
          description: URL not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: URL not found
        '500':
          description: Server error while generating QR code
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: Server error
